paramSchema.title: Hostname
paramSchema.name: hostname
paramSchema.description: The hostname or IP address of the JMX Region server

paramSchema.title: Port
paramSchema.name: port
paramSchema.description: The port of the JMX Region server

paramSchema.title: Username
paramSchema.name: username
paramSchema.description: If the JMX endpoint is password protected, what username should graphdat use when calling it.

paramSchema.title: Password
paramSchema.name: password
paramSchema.description: If the JMX endpoint is password protected, what password should graphdat use when calling it.

paramSchema.title: Poll Seconds
paramSchema.name: pollSeconds
paramSchema.description: How often should the plugin poll the JMX endpoint

paramSchema.title: Source
paramSchema.name: source
paramSchema.description: The Source to display in the legend for the HBase data.  It will default to the hostname of the server
